allReviews.title:
1.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Phone BROKE
allReviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2024
allReviews.body: Would be zero stars if able! Purchased this phone and within 3 months of use it just shut off and wouldn't turn back on. In doing research and seeing international version the internet will tell you that the difference is simply that you can use the phone internationally without needing to switch sim cards. That is true but also means that any warranty from Samsung is null and void. The phones are purchased cheaply out of Peru and sold as from an American company in Miami for more. When you call to see if there's anything they can do with the brick they've sold you their response is no. Nothing of monetary value and they won't do anything to help otherwise.

allReviews.title:
5.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Very advanced and comfortable to hold with all important features for an affordable price!
allReviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2024
allReviews.body: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS PHONE; THIS IS HANDS DOWN THE BEST AFFORABLE PHONE I HAVE EVER HAD.IT HAS ALMOST ALL THE FEATURES I HAD ON MY S22 ULTRA. SAMSUNG NEVER DISAPPOINTS ME. FACE RECOGNITION & FINGERPRINT READER ON A BUDGET PHONE...TOP TEIR, THE FRONT AND BACK CAMERAS ARE GREAT FOR THE KIND OF PHONE THIS IS. VERY NICE LOOK AND THE COLOR OF THE PHONE GIVES METALIC WHITE JUST BEAUTIFUL. IT FITS COMFORTABLE IN MY HAND. BATTERY LIFE IS AMAZING LASTS ME 24 HOURS. I AM BEYOND IMPRESSED.IF YOURE THINKING OF GETTING IT, GO FOR IT 5/5 HANDS DOWN...THERE'S A CASE INCLUDED (BLACK) AS WELL

allReviews.body: Familiar classic functionality like adjustable split screen & pro mode photo with flash.Has a 3.5 aux jack, which I need for music stuff without adding an extra c adapter like other newer phones.The included case has a very rough rivet attaching the ring to the case. The rough spot is on the inside pressed against the phone surface & only has a paper sticker covering it, I wouldnt use it. I bought an aftermarket shock case with no ring.I'm trading this in for the version with 256 memory instead of this one's 128.

allReviews.title:
4.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Great budget friendly phone
allReviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2024
allReviews.body: I purchased this phone as a replacement of an outdated Samsung android smartphone. However, soon after switching my old information to this phone, I received a message that some advanced features are unavailable but, I am fine with it because the phone has been working great for me so far. It's an International Unlocked phone so it works with many phone carriers in the United States. Most importantly, double check to make sure this phone will work with your current cellphone carrier before making a purchase.

    No visual voicemail
allReviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2024
allReviews.body: Everything about this phone is great EXCEPT there is no visual voicemail. You have to get to your voicemail my pressing and holding the one on the phone keypad and you need to remember your password that you haven't had to use in years. Which, in general, that wouldn't be awful, except there's no notification when you have a voicemail. I got this for my mom who has a lot of medical appointments and phone calls to set up appointments, and it just doesn't work for her.

criticalReviews.title:
1.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Phone BROKE
criticalReviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2024
criticalReviews.body: Would be zero stars if able! Purchased this phone and within 3 months of use it just shut off and wouldn't turn back on. In doing research and seeing international version the internet will tell you that the difference is simply that you can use the phone internationally without needing to switch sim cards. That is true but also means that any warranty from Samsung is null and void. The phones are purchased cheaply out of Peru and sold as from an American company in Miami for more. When you call to see if there's anything they can do with the brick they've sold you their response is no. Nothing of monetary value and they won't do anything to help otherwise.

criticalReviews.title:
3.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Great phone, but misleading information
criticalReviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2024
criticalReviews.body: I purchased this phone because it said it was 4G network. However, the information given by the seller was misleading. I found out through my phone company Verizon, that the reason my phone service wasn't so good, it's because of the network which only goes up to 3G. I had to return it and now get the 5G version.Apart from this, the phone is great for this price! I highly recommend the Samsung A15 for a basic phone.

criticalReviews.title:
3.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    No visual voicemail
criticalReviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2024
criticalReviews.body: Everything about this phone is great EXCEPT there is no visual voicemail. You have to get to your voicemail my pressing and holding the one on the phone keypad and you need to remember your password that you haven't had to use in years. Which, in general, that wouldn't be awful, except there's no notification when you have a voicemail. I got this for my mom who has a lot of medical appointments and phone calls to set up appointments, and it just doesn't work for her.

criticalReviews.title:
3.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Mediocre
criticalReviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2024
criticalReviews.body: Honestly very mediocre. I will remind myself to pay more for a better phone.Camera is the worst , especially in lowlight like at night even if lights are on.  The screen is very fragile and cracked when i sat on it by accident. The only good thing about this phone is that the battery can handle a full day of work and it could go on two or more days without much use.It will lag with many apps open , it's not really fast.I had a previous model samsung and it was way better.

productDetails.productTitle: Samsung Galaxy A15 (SM-155M/DSN), 128GB 6GB RAM, Dual SIM, Factory Unlocked GSM, International Version (Ring Grip Case Bundle) (Blue Black)
featureBullets: Packaging contains the cell phone, a USB C to USB C cable, and a sim tray ejector tool.
Display: Super AMOLED, 90Hz, 800 nits (HBM) | 6.5 inches, 103.7 cm2 (~84.3% screen-to-body ratio) | 1080 x 2340 pixels, 19.5:9 ratio (~396 ppi density)
Cameras: 50 MP, f/1.8, (wide), AF | 5 MP, f/2.2, (ultrawide) | 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro)
This device is compatible with any GSM carrier outside of the United States. In the United States, this device is only compatible with T-Mobile and their MVNO's(Mint, Ultra, Ting, Tello, etc.)
Operating System: Android; Cpu Model Family: mediatek_helio
